definition[0]: a farm animal with short legs, a fat body, and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes pork, bacon,  and ham.
definition[1]: someone who eats too much or eats more than their share
example[1]: You greedy pig, you ate all the candy!
example[2]: I made a bit of a pig of myself  (=ate too much) at dinner.
definition[2]: someone who is unpleasant in some way, for example unkind or very untidy
note[0]: (male) chauvinist pig (=a man who thinks women are not equal to men)
example[3]: They live like pigs in that house over the road.
